H1.text: who are the judges on do you think you can dance. Mary Murphy

H3.text: who are the judges on do you think you can dance. Mia Michaels

A4.text: Murphy was part of the original guest judge and choreographer pool when season 1 began in 2005.

A5.text: For season 7, it was announced that Mia Michaels would replace Murphy as permanent judge.

A6.text: He served as a permanent judge for the first sixteen seasons.

A7.text: She was a judge during season 7 with Adam Shankman and Nigel Lythgoe.
